Sandwiches, Chicken Shop, Burger

DeliveryTakeout

“I have been on the hunt for a solid chicken sandwich ever since I moved to SF, but I have been consistently disappointed. When three different people recommended Hotbird to me and even went as far as to compare it to Howlin Ray's, I knew I needed to try it. I ordered online on a weekday, and my…” more
